Event.Maindescription:
SIS Monthly Satsang - May 2013

Please be informed that the May Satsang is rescheduled and will now be held at the residence of Mr Giridhar & Mrs Hema Giridhar.

Events
3.00 p.m : Vishnu Sahasranamam
3.20 p.m : Lalitha Sahasranamam
3:40 p.m : Bhajans
4:00 p.m : Spiritual Talk
4:15 p.m : Aarathi and Prasadam

Please RSVP by 10th May to Mr Giridhar & Mrs Hema Giridhar directly on 07877439541 or 07877261505. or by e-mailing sisnambalava@gmail.com
